segments.text: My attention shifts now to the two children on the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy attempting to climb a stool, reaching for the upper cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly wobbly, its legs splayed out in an alarming way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so high, one hand already in the cookie jar labeled “COOKIE JAR.”
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in his posture, a determined little thief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, her hand outstretched, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even touching the stool, just anticipating the sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the way that stool is tilted, it looks ready to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash and the clatter of falling dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole operation feels incredibly risky for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their secret mission, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect storm of oblivious adults and mischievous children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or break anything important.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a predicament they've created for themselves!
segments.speaker: PAR
